author: rdonkin
msg: Starting work on a JPA port. I propose to leave the torque version as legacy code to allow an upgrade path. So, no common code will be factored out at this stage. The first stage will be a straight OM conversion from torque to JPA. Note that this will retain the unsatisfactory table structure (for the time being).
